responseText: NSLOCTEXT("", "92E04E3B4E53EC6F071032B404A8F46C", "Only one has been known to be crafted. Employing the Illucidian Theorem, one can craft a Lightpact Configuration should they acquire enough Trimenium Angles and a Solusian Anvil, both native only to the Forges of the undermountain Sulosia. ")
name: MADD_0002_ArcanaEncyclopedius_18
